text: 42|18|Yihamte iyara prati imana posana nakarae sihamte'i iyaka tbaraanbita karaiba bicarae. Arau yisakale imana aniche te'omloke iyara paraa bhita hai thake arau te'omloke jane ye, eya niscitabharae satya. Jani thoraa, niscaya kiyamata samparke yisakale baka-bitanda karae sihamte ghora bibhraantita nipatita.
